snippet: German authorities say they expect to have a cannabis-growing program up and running in 2019 after the country approved legislation allowing some patients to get the drug as a prescription medication....

headline.main: Mourinho Says Rooney to Everton Talk Is 'Nonsense'
headline.print_headline: Mourinho Says Rooney to Everton Talk Is 'Nonsense'

lead_paragraph: German authorities say they expect to have a cannabis-growing program up and running in 2019 after the country approved legislation allowing some patients to get the drug as a prescription medication.
